title: IVR-Based Language Practice Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate or higher language proficiency and basic IVR equipment operation experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening immediately applicable language communication skills in practical work environments

learning_goals: Perform situational dialogue scenarios reflecting cultural contexts in IVR environments with over 80% fluency.
Operate a learner-customized feedback system (with at least 3 repeated practice sessions) using interactive tools in virtual reality spaces.
Compare and analyze CAVE systems and HMDs, then propose at least two IVR training strategies suitable for work environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
